title: Tollbooth
description: Jimmy Saare collects tolls on the New Jersey Parkway. He's had a mental snap has set him away from his pregnant wife, Sarah and uncontrollably towards the 19 year-old Gena who leans seductively against the Officetown copy machine. Despite his wife Sarahâ€™s impending pregnancy, Jimmy pursues his desire for Gena, unexpectedly becoming more entangled with the strange manipulations of an anarchistic teenager, Kid with Clownhead, who wants to start his own destructive cult when he grows up."A gloriously deranged, endless original adventure through ordinary bat country" - Drunk Monkeys
author: Bud  Smith
